title: Bloomberg Markets: Uettwiller on Making Film With Nike
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Uettwiller on Making Film With Nike
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Chris Uettwiller\u0010Chief Executive Officer\u0010Dirty Robber\u0010Discussing producing the documentary "Breaking 2", commissioned by Nike, about three runners attempting to run a marathon in less than two hours.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
